body_html: In addition to x[[0,4,3]], torch.arange(0, 25)[[0,4,3]] doesn't work either, except the workaround torch.arange(0, 25)[[0,4,3], :] isn't possible for the lack of dimensions. (I guess this one may exist on TODO as well, but since stumbled upon it, will leave it here for completeness).
body_text: In addition to x[[0,4,3]], torch.arange(0, 25)[[0,4,3]] doesn't work either, except the workaround torch.arange(0, 25)[[0,4,3], :] isn't possible for the lack of dimensions. (I guess this one may exist on TODO as well, but since stumbled upon it, will leave it here for completeness).
body: In addition to `x[[0,4,3]]`, `torch.arange(0, 25)[[0,4,3]]` doesn't work either, except the workaround `torch.arange(0, 25)[[0,4,3], :]` isn't possible for the lack of dimensions. (I guess this one may exist on TODO as well, but since stumbled upon it, will leave it here for completeness).
